Name: Augite (Ca,Na)(Mg,Fe,Al,Ti)(Si,Al)_2O_6
Type: Mineral
Class: Silicates
Subclass: Inosilicates
Particle Size: 0-45um
Sample No.: IN-15A
Owner: JPL
Wavelength Range: VNIR-SWIR
Origin: USA
Collected by JPL
Description: 





Measurement: Hemispherical reflectance
First Column: X
Second Column: Y
X Units:  Wavelength (micrometers)
Y Units:  Reflectance (percent)
First X Value:   0.40
Last X Value:   2.50
Number of X Values:  826
Additional Information: in15aa.txt
